Beautiful Upgradeï¼š

ğŸ­ The depth redefines the editor syntax, and the color highlights. You will find that the editor is more fashionable.
ğŸ‰ Support shortcut key output bold / italic / strike / underline / link, and support block tab to move left and right.
ğŸ©´ Support Emoji shortname, export documents, add titles, set anchor scrolling, and open external chain.
ğŸ™Š The shortcut keys are normalized, and the number of displayed words is changed to command+option+i, the finder is opened and unified as command+option+r, and the new folder is unified as command+shift+n.
ğŸ˜‚ Fix the occasional crash of repeated formatting, the dotted line display in the dark, and the occasional error of hyperlink highlighting.
